BodyName: Committee on Sanitation and Solid Waste Management

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to the responsibility of an owner, lessee, tenant or person in charge of a vacant lot to maintain such lot and adjacent areas.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Responsibility of an owner, lessee, tenant or person in charge of a vacant lot to maintain such lot and adjacent areas.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to improper disposal of recyclable material at one- and two-family dwellings.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Improper disposal of recyclable material at one- and two-family dwellings.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to limiting the issuance of notices of violations for litter during certain times to mixed use buildings.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Limiting the issuance of notices of violations for litter during certain times to mixed use buildings.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to the responsibility of an owner, lessee, tenant or person in charge of a vacant lot to maintain such lot and adjacent areas.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Laid Over by Committee
